c74object.name: faustgen~
c74object.description:
faustgen~
allows to easily use Faust source code inside a Max/MSP patcher, edit it, change compilation options, and even produce the processor flow chart as an SVG diagram. Double-click on the object to display the set of available commands.

inlet.description: The audio signal and messages to control the DSP.

objarg.name: name
objarg.digest: A name for the internal DSP code.
objarg.description: A name for the internal DSP code, all faustgen~ objects using the same name will actually be instances of the same DSP code.

method.name: read
method.digest: The pathname of the .dsp file to be loaded.
method.description: The pathname of the .dsp file to be loaded.

method.name: write
method.digest: The pathname of the .dsp file to be saved.
method.description: The pathname of the .dsp file to be saved.

method.name: librarypath
method.digest: The folder pathname of additionnal Faust libraries.
method.description: The folder pathname of additionnal Faust libraries.

method.name: compileoptions
method.description: The list of compile options to be given to the Faust compiler (typically : -vec -lv 1, or -vec -lv 0 -vs 32).

method.name: osc
method.digest: To activate OSC control in input and output mode.
method.description: To activate OSC control in input and output mode, possibly generating messages when xmit = 1, and in bundle mode when bundle = 1.

method.name: init
method.digest: To generate all inputs and outputs control messages.
method.description: To generate all inputs and outputs control messages as a message list [path, init, min, max].

method.name: dump
method.digest: To generate all inputs and outputs control messages.
method.description: To generate all inputs and outputs control messages as a message list [path, cur, min, max].

method.name: polyphony
method.digest: To set the DSP in polyphonic mode.
method.description: To set the DSP in polyphonic mode with nvoices (int)>.

entry.name: signals
entry.description: The output signals of the DSP.
